title: COZSINOOR Queen Size Cooling Bed Pillows for Sleeping: Hotel Quality, Set of 2 - Down Alternative Microfiber Filled for Back, Stomach, Side Sleepers, Breathable, and Skin-Friendly
descriptions:
Experience the ultimate comfort and luxury with the COZSINOOR Queen Size Cooling Bed Pillows for Sleeping. This set of 2 pillows is perfect for back, stomach, and side sleepers, ensuring a restful night's sleep every time.

Crafted with Down Alternative Microfiber filling and a breathable polyester blend cover, these pillows are not only skin-friendly but also machine washable for easy care. The plush hollow fiber filling provides excellent neck support and retains its shape, while the no-shift construction keeps the pillows in place all night long.

Designed to be cooling and supportive, these pillows are perfect for those looking for a hotel-quality sleep experience. And with the vacuum-packed packaging, you can rest assured that your pillows will be fresh and ready to use after just 24 hours. Upgrade your sleep experience with the COZSINOOR Queen Size Cooling Bed Pillows today!
